attributes.action: Super nanny Jo Frost to be Minister for Children.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned would ask our government to create a new ministry called The Ministry for Children's Welfare, and a government representative approach Super Nanny Jo Frost to become the Secretary of State for said ministry. We have all seen Jo Frost work her magic on television and we all feel her skills would help more parents if she was to become the leader of a government department responsible for structure, discipline and welfare of the child. We cannot see anybody more qualified for this than Jo Frost.
